comment:
"по клику на прометиумные цистерны или баки
можно сделать их взрывающимися"

languages.text: В нарушение всех обетов безопасности прометиевые баки брошены открытыми без присмотра и могут воспламениться от любой искры.
In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.
languages.original_text: В нарушение всех обетов безопасности прометиевые баки брошены открытыми без присмотра и могут воспламениться от любой искры.

traits.locale_text: In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would take a single spark to ignite them.
In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would take a single spark to ignite them.
In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.
In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.
In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.
In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.

languages.text: Die Promethium-Tanks wurden offen und unbewacht zurückgelassen, ein Verstoß gegen jeden Sicherheitseid. Ein einziger Funken würde ausreichen, um sie zu entzünden.
languages.original_text: In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.

traits.locale_text: Die Promethium-Tanks wurden offen und unbewacht zurückgelassen, ein Verstoß gegen jeden Sicherheitseid. Ein einziger Funken würde ausreichen, um sie zu entzünden.

languages.text: Contrairement à toutes les règles de sécurité en vigueur, les réservoirs de prométhium ont été laissés ouverts et sans surveillance. Il suffit d'une étincelle pour y mettre le feu.
languages.original_text: In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.

traits.locale_text: Contrairement à toutes les règles de sécurité en vigueur, les réservoirs de prométhium ont été laissés ouverts et sans surveillance. Il suffit d'une étincelle pour y mettre le feu.

languages.text: 这些钷素罐罐口大开，无人看管。这违反了所有安全誓言的规定，只要一点火花就能把它们点燃。
languages.original_text: In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.

traits.locale_text: 这些钷素罐罐口大开，无人看管。这违反了所有安全誓言的规定，只要一点火花就能把它们点燃。

languages.text: あらゆるセキュリティの誓いに違反した状態で、プロメチウムタンクは開けっぱなしで中は無人だ。火花がひとつでもあれば火をつけるだろう。
languages.original_text: In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.

traits.locale_text: あらゆるセキュリティの誓いに違反した状態で、プロメチウムタンクは開けっぱなしで中は無人だ。火花がひとつでもあれば火をつけるだろう。

languages.text: Violando todos los votos de seguridad, los tanques de prometio se han dejado abiertos y desatendidos. Bastaría una sola chispa para que ardan.
languages.original_text: In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.

traits.locale_text: Violando todos los votos de seguridad, los tanques de prometio se han dejado abiertos y desatendidos. Bastaría una sola chispa para que ardan.

languages.text: Prometyum tankları, tüm güvenlik yeminleri ihlal edilerek açık ve gözetimsiz bırakılmış. Tutuşmaları için bir kıvılcım yeter.
languages.original_text: In violation of all security vows, the promethium tanks have been left open and unattended. It would only take a single spark to ignite them.

traits.locale_text: Tüm güvenlik yeminleri ihlal edilerek prometyum tankları açık ve gözetimsiz bırakılmış. Tek bir kıvılcımda patlama riski mevcut.
